tool_description: Increase your engagement with contextual auto-generated comments.
name: Uplifting-Instagram-Comment-Generator
title: Uplifting-Instagram-Comment-Generator

api_list.name: GenerateComment
api_list.description: Get a auto-generated comment based on a post's caption. Response length options: "short" and "long".
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://uplifting-instagram-comment-generator.p.rapidapi.com/ig/comment"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "uplifting-instagram-comment-generator.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
